actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to permit certain rates of compensation for rural letter carriers employed by the U.S. Postal Service.

summary.text: Provides that rural letter carriers may be paid at a rate of compensation established by any collective bargaining agreement made between the Postal Service and any recognized bargaining representative.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to permit certain rates of compensation for rural letter carriers employed by the U.S. Postal Service.
